page.title: 11TRANSPORT IN MID DEVON
page.content: In part of the block public transport is non-existent and each family has its own transport. Another part of the block has a bus twice a week - Wednesday and Saturday going in to Okehampton at 9.30 am and returning at 12.15 pm. There is also a bus to Exeter once a month on a Friday allowing a whole day in the city. Once a month on a Wednesday <market day> there is a bus to Holsworthy, leaving at 9.30 am and returning at 2.15 pm. These services are well patronized - passengers being picked up at cross roads. As there is no school in the block primary school children travel to Hatherleigh - about 4 miles away - on a school bus and secondary children go to Okehampton - about 4 miles in the opposite direction. From September 1985 the public may travel on the school bus.
